description: Replace Bull-based PDF export queue with Temporal workflow. Create PdfExportWorkflow with activities for: 1) Retrieve document content, 2) Generate PDF using PDFKit/Puppeteer, 3) Upload to storage, 4) Update document with PDF URL, 5) Notify user on completion. Implement long-running workflow support (PDF generation can take minutes). Add cancellation support for abandoned exports. Configure heartbeat for long activities.
title: Migrate PDF Export Queue to Temporal Workflow
